kareltherobot
Interface Directions

All Known Subinterfaces:
RobotTask
All Known Implementing Classes:
KJRTest, MiniBuilder, Robot, UrRobot, World, WorldBuilder
public interface Directions

Directions implements the direction names and also the infinity value for the number * of beepers carried by a robot. You must implement this interface in any robot program.
